snippet: The Ukrainian government said it had proof that Russia had provided the surface-to-air missile system that shot down a Malaysia Airlines passenger jet, killing all 298 people aboard.
abstract: Ukrainian government says it has proof that Russia provided separatist rebels with surface-to-air missile system that shot down Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over eastern Ukraine, killing all 298 people aboard; suggests an attempted cover-up.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and SABRINA TAVERNISE
byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn reported from Kiev, and Sabrina Tavernise from Grabovo, Ukraine. Reporting was contributed by Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow; Keith Bradsher and Chris Buckley from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian government said it had proof that Russia had provided the surface-to-air missile system that shot down a Malaysia Airlines passenger jet, killing all 298 people aboard.

headline.sub: Ukraine Accuses Russia of Providing Missiles That Felled\ Malaysia Jet
headline.main: Ukraine Says It Can Prove Russia Supplied Arms System That Felled Jet
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Says It Can Prove Russia Supplied Arms System That Felled Jet
